summary: This bill, the Government Accountability Office District of Columbia Home Rule Act, aims to remove the Government Accountability Office's (GAO) oversight of the District of Columbia government. It amends title 31 of the United States Code and the District of Columbia Home Rule Act to eliminate GAO's authority regarding audits, program evaluations, and reports related to the District. The bill seeks to limit the GAO’s ability to oversee and review the actions of the D.C. government.
